title: BEGIN_TEXT_COMMAND_SET_BLIP_NAME
content:
0xF9113A30DE5C66700xF4C211F6// BeginTextCommandSetBlipName
void BEGIN_TEXT_COMMAND_SET_BLIP_NAME(char* textLabel);Parameters:textLabel: The text label to set.Starts a text command to change the name of a blip displayed in the pause menu.This should be paired with END_TEXT_COMMAND_SET_BLIP_NAME, once adding all required text components.Examples:Lua-- creates a blip called 'Food for me!' at 0.0, 0.0, 0.0
AddTextEntry('MYBLIP', 'Food for ~a~!')

local blip = AddBlipForCoord(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
BeginTextCommandSetBlipName('MYBLIP')
AddTextComponentSubstringPlayerName('me')
EndTextCommandSetBlipName(blip)
codeBlocks:
-- creates a blip called 'Food for me!' at 0.0, 0.0, 0.0
AddTextEntry('MYBLIP', 'Food for ~a~!')

local blip = AddBlipForCoord(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
BeginTextCommandSetBlipName('MYBLIP')
AddTextComponentSubstringPlayerName('me')
EndTextCommandSetBlipName(blip)
